name: Bop!
description:
Welcome to Bop!

Use your conveniently sticky hammer to stick to your enemies, and harness their abilities, joining you together with them. But, don't get too greedy! Your speed is joined together with the amount of enemies you try to pick up. Pick up too many, and you'll have trouble getting anywhere anytime soon.

~ Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, in collaboration with TDLPoof ~
